page.title: 07Farming Around Guildtown
page.content:
This is a predominately farming area. In our delineated map area there are six main farms.These are both cattle and arable farms.
The cattle, beef and dairy, are cross breeds mostly and include Ayrshire, Jersey, Friesian, Galloway, Aberdeen_Angus, Hereford and Highland.
On the arable farms are grown mostly raspberries, peas and potatoes as well as the usual oil_seed rape, wheat, barley, turnips and grass for grazing and silage.
Of the 383 people who live in the designated area 89 live in farmhouses or cottages outwith the two villages of Guildtown and St.Martin's.
